languages.text: Преступники улыбаются, когда конвой ведет их навстречу новым клеткам. Любой способ выбраться с дрейфующего корабля кажется им благословением.
The prisoners smile as they are being escorted to their new cages. Any means of escaping the drifting ship is a blessing to them.
languages.original_text: Преступники улыбаются, когда конвой ведет их навстречу новым клеткам. Любой способ выбраться с дрейфующего корабля кажется им благословением.

traits.locale_text: The prisoners smile as they are being escorted to their new cages. Any means of escaping the drifting ship is a blessing to them.

The prisoners smile as they are being escorted to their new cages. Any means of escaping the drifting ship is a blessing to them.

languages.text: Die Gefangenen grinsen, als sie zu ihren neuen Käfigen eskortiert werden. Von dem treibenden Schiff herunterzukommen, ist für sie ein Segen. Egal wie.
languages.original_text: The prisoners smile as they are being escorted to their new cages. Any means of escaping the drifting ship is a blessing to them.

traits.locale_text: Die Gefangenen grinsen, als sie zu ihren neuen Käfigen eskortiert werden. Von dem treibenden Schiff herunterzukommen, ist für sie ein Segen. Egal wie.

languages.text: Les détenus se laissent escorter jusqu'à leurs nouvelles cages avec le sourire. Ils auraient accepté n'importe quel sort, du moment que cela leur permettait d'échapper au vaisseau condamné.
languages.original_text: The prisoners smile as they are being escorted to their new cages. Any means of escaping the drifting ship is a blessing to them.

traits.locale_text: Les détenus se laissent escorter jusqu'à leurs nouvelles cages avec le sourire. Ils auraient accepté n'importe quel sort, du moment que cela leur permettait d'échapper au vaisseau condamné.

languages.text: 囚人たちは、新たな檻へと護送されながら笑みを浮かべている。漂流する船から逃れる手段は、彼らにとってどんなものであれ救いなのだ。
languages.original_text: The prisoners smile as they are being escorted to their new cages. Any means of escaping the drifting ship is a blessing to them.

traits.locale_text: 囚人たちは、新たな檻へと護送されながら笑みを浮かべている。漂流する船から逃れる手段は、彼らにとってどんなものであれ救いなのだ。

languages.text: Los prisioneros sonríen de camino a sus nuevas jaulas. Cualquier escapatoria de la nave a la deriva es una bendición para ellos.
languages.original_text: The prisoners smile as they are being escorted to their new cages. Any means of escaping the drifting ship is a blessing to them.

traits.locale_text: Los prisioneros sonríen de camino a sus nuevas jaulas. Cualquier escapatoria de la nave a la deriva es una bendición para ellos.

languages.text: 那些囚犯被带到了新的监狱。被关到牢笼里时，所有人都面带笑容。对他们而言，只要能逃离那艘船就好。
languages.original_text: The prisoners smile as they are being escorted to their new cages. Any means of escaping the drifting ship is a blessing to them.

traits.locale_text: 那些囚犯被带到了新的监狱。被关到牢笼里时，所有人都面带笑容。对他们而言，只要能逃离那艘船就好。

languages.text: Mahkûmlar, yeni hapishanelerine güle oynaya giriyor. O başıboş gemiden kurtulmuş olmak, onlar için başlı başına bir lütuf.
languages.original_text: The prisoners smile as they are being escorted to their new cages. Any means of escaping the drifting ship is a blessing to them.

traits.locale_text: Mahkûmlar, yeni hapishanelerine güle oynaya giriyorlar. O başıboş gemiden kurtulmuş olmak, onlar için başlı başına bir lütuf.
